findings.title: Suggested Address Validity Check
findings.description: In the `VToken` contract, there is a lack of parameter validity check in the `mintBehalfFresh()` function for the second input argument `receiver`. It may cause the loss of user’s asset if the user accidentally sets the `receiver` to `address(0)`.

findings.title: Non ERC20-Compliance Of VToken
findings.description: ERC20-compliance issue in the implementation of Venus MintBehalf contract, specifically in the mintBehalfFresh() function where it emits the Transfer event by specifying the contract itself as the _from address instead of 0x0.

findings.title: Inconsistency Between Document And Implementation
findings.description: Misleading comment in `mintBehalfInternal()` function of `VToken` contract causing unnecessary hurdles to understand and/or maintain the software.
